Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/2/0xace62f87abe9f4ee9fd6e115d91548df24ca0943.sol#625-655) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/2/0xace62f87abe9f4ee9fd6e115d91548df24ca0943.sol#646-655)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/2/0xace62f87abe9f4ee9fd6e115d91548df24ca0943.sol#639-655)
